idea:
In a world that's made radical technological advancement in the last century, everything still remains a task. In fact, manual chores have simply been replaced by tech chores and half our time gets spent swiping, typing, switching between devices, or updating ourselves on how to operate the latest tech.


We believe in building an effortless future by changing the way humans interact with technology. A world where technology learns the human way of doing things, not the other way round. A world where one can simply talk to a machine, like one would to a friend, to get things done. After all, isn't conversation the most natural, human way to express our intention?

To this end, we are building an artificially intelligent, super friendly and voice-activated travel bot- Genie.


Easily controlled through the O Genie app, Genie won't just simplify the steps involved in travelling, but will talk to you, learn your preferences and give you a completely personalized travel experience, from start to finish.


Be it flight booking, hotel booking, cabs to and from the airport, checking-in and navigating the airport, useful alerts and tips, or planning activities once you arrive at your destination, Genie will help you through it all- all you have to do is say 'O Genie'
name: GENIETALK PRIVATE LIMITED
